Author: Berna
Name: TF2-ish Critical Hits Plugin
Punchline: Deal critical hits just like in the #1 hat simulator, Team Fortress 2.
Description:
Deal critical hits just like in the #1 hat simulator, Team Fortress 2.

* Set sounds and flavor text to be played/shown whenever you deal direct or critical damage or heal.
* Use different configurations by job.
* Use the game's SFX or your own custom WAV or MP3 files.
